entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When compiling Blazor Hybrid app with NativeAOT, can't root System.Action generic #80075
  • .NET 7 application hangs during GC #80073
    8.0.0
  • Setting max worker threads of ThreadPool neither work nor fail #80072
  • Unsafe.ReadUnaligned / WriteUnaligned cause Unhandled fault: alignment exception on armhf #80068
  • Encoding.UTF8-Api has a low performance? #80067
  • PublishSingleFile=true + EventListener causes EventPipeEventDispatcher.DispatchEventsToEventListeners() to fully occupy a CPU core #80064
  • [.NET 7] OptionsConfigurationServiceCollectionExtensions.Configure regression #80062
  • [API Proposal]: StringBuilder.IndexOf(string find, int start) #80060
  • [API Proposal]: `KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>` override `GetHashCode`, `Equals` and operators #80058

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Revisit process/thread termination scenario #74711
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Properties in the watch window show "𝑓 <Property>" instead of the value of the property #49144
    8.0.0
  • Targets* properties in libraries are ambiguous #44946
    Future
  • Is it possible to start notepad from a service in the logged on user? #80050
  • Logging errors on Linux similar to Windows Event Log #10526
    Future
  • Query: Quantified advantage of using System.Text.Json over Newtonsoft #80065
  • Missing apostrophe in string display of Queryable expression #80069
  • (Bounded)Channel Leaks memory on streams with few writes and many cancelled reads. #80057
  • [API Proposal]: StringBuild.Substring #80061
  • Getting segfault error 4 in libcoreclr.so #80047
  • [QUERY] Issue Implementing High Performance Logger when switching to .net6.0 #79087
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Use shipping runtime.json for RID targeting #80074
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix HTTP/2 extended connect hang #80066
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Objective-C reference tracking #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Cleanup and rationalizing process/thread termination scenario #80063
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CompareInfo.Icu.cs #79787
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Re-enable UploadValues_Success test #80034
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add a test for IndexOfAnyValues.GetValues #80038
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Replace the last two SIMDIntrinsic in LIR with NamedIntrinsic and delete GT_SIMD #80027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Expand compare + brfalse/brtrue with single conditional branch opcode #80046
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #79940
    area-System.Security
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Resolve generic virtual methods in managed type system #80035
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT checked leg #79847
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add structural equality and order comparison for common collections #80025
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • Fix crash in fixer on certain invalid patterns #80007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
